author: lzybkr
body: It looks like a change in Add-Type didn't make it from master-sd to master, make sure master has the latest and correct code.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
The difference is originated in two commits that are fixing things with a less strict PS/PS layout for dlls.
I looked at the diff with @daxian-dbw and the version in **master** is the correct one.

We don't need to port to bring this changes back for Nano server, because we have a strict layout there.

title: Add-Type - update master from master-sd
